job 1.title: MARKETING CONSULTANT
responsibilities: Efficiently manage a marketing budget of $200,000, ensuring optimal allocation for maximum ROI.
Strengthen and expand strategic partnerships, fostering collaborations with key stakeholders to enhance brand visibility and market reach.
Oversee and implement strategies to optimize the operation of the company website, ensuring an enhanced user experience and improved online presence.
Identify and execute events and initiatives that significantly increase referrals, driving organic growth and expanding the customer base.
Develop and execute robust social media advertising campaigns, coupled with engaging content creation, to elevate brand awareness and engagement across various platforms.
Spearhead effective email marketing campaigns, leveraging segmentation and personalized content to nurture leads, enhance customer retention, and drive conversions.
Implement tools and strategies to monitor website traffic, analyzing user behavior and trends to make data-driven decisions for continuous improvement.
Establish and implement key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure the success of marketing efforts, ensuring alignment with overall business objectives.
Generate and present comprehensive monthly reports on marketing KPIs, providing insights into performance, areas for improvement, and strategic recommendations for achieving marketing goals.
Contribute to the development and execution of a comprehensive marketing strategy, aligning marketing initiatives with overall business objectives and market trends.

job 2.title: MARKETING DIRECTOR
responsibilities: Led the department autonomously, demonstrating self-starting initiative and pioneering the development of systems to drive company growth. Established efficient task delegation methods, optimizing operations and fostering organizational effectiveness.
Executed marketing plans driving a 10% increase in sales, gained 1,500 net social media followers, hosted 4 weekly events with 2 samplings, and ran ads reaching 100,000 monthly.
Planned and executed campaigns, increasing a low Daypart by 10% and attracting 50 new app users monthly while retaining a daily customer base of 2,500.
Managed online presence, generating 3,000 new followers while maintaining a net gain of 1,500, optimizing customer interactions and driving sales.
Cultivate and maintain relationships within the local community, partnering with schools, organizations, and local businesses to enhance brand visibility and contribute to community growth.
Collaborate with external partners to create impactful advertising materials and press releases that highlight our offerings and values.
Effectively managed a marketing budget of $24,000 annually, with additional allocations for events, ensuring optimal resource allocation and cost-efficient execution of initiatives.
Utilize data and analytics tools to measure the effectiveness of marketing strategies, making data-driven decisions to improve campaigns continuously.
Work closely with cross-functional teams, including operations and customer service, to ensure seamless execution of marketing initiatives and consistent customer experience.
Led and mentored marketing team members, fostering their professional growth and ensuring alignment with company values and objectives.
Research industry trends, competitor activities, and customer preferences actively to inform marketing strategies and maintain a competitive edge.

job 3.title: MARKETING (DATA) ANALYST
responsibilities: Communicate and visualize lead lifecycle to close through data
Connect and configure various API's into one SQL Database
Manage key marketing data via both manual and automated metric collection methods
Responsible for understanding how data flows from Marketing Automation all the way through CRM.

job 4.title: MARKETING DIRECTOR
responsibilities: Developed a ticketing system from scratch using advanced Excel formulas to track revenue generation
Build data-driven marketing strategies for 10+ clients ranging from educational institutions to concert venues.
Generated over 800 concert ticket sales for the University of Southern Maine as the Chairman of the Students Event Association
Curated 6 sellout student shows with 500+ in attendance, generated over 40k in revenue, and contributed to an increased enrollment rate.
Accomplishments featured in the University of Southern Maine's free press
Increased social media presence by 500% through Search Engine Optimization and promotional content
Pitched entertainment events to key stakeholders such as the Director of Student Life and Head of USM School Board
Drive and execute marketing strategies to capture customer information for specific clients through email marketing.

job 5.title: DIGITAL ADVERTISING CONSULTANT
responsibilities: Responsible for launching over 150+ new client accounts by leveraging various internal and external marketing/CRM software (Google Ads, Bing Ads, Admiral, Fluency, Salesforce etc..) to improve customer traffic for Dealer.com
Conducted Weekly Quality Assurance assessments to ensure high customer satisfaction
This resulted in optimizing 400+ accounts and resolving issues for existing Dealer.com clients
Execute within a process driven environment by learning multiple systems within a month time, maintaining internal data integrity, and managing client information.
